page.description: Enables the main Alpha Five program window.
page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.ENABLE() Syntax &ltOBJECT>.ENABLE() Description The &ltOBJECT>.ENABLE() method applies to:
Alpha Anywhere (for &ltOBJECT> use the keyword "A5")
Browses (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltBROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltFORM> pointer or the name of the form)
Form Controls (for &ltOBJECT> use the &ltCONTROL> pointer or the address of the control) The &ltOBJECT>.ENABLE() method makes a form able to receive focus. The method also works with fields, buttons, check boxes, etc. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example The following script on the OnDepart event for the PayMethod field on a form enables the CreditCard field if the payment method is "Credit Card": if (PayMethod.value = "Credit Card") then CreditCard.enable() else CreditCard.disable() end if
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
